00031 //----------------------------------------------------------
00032 GrLightMgr::GrLightMgr()
00033 {
00034         B_ASSERT( gGrLightMgr == 0 );
00035         gGrLightMgr = this;
00036 
00038         B_ASSERT( gRRsrcMgr );
00039         gRRsrcMgr->RegisterScriptParser( GR_KW_LIGHT, ParseLight );
00040 }

00042 //----------------------------------------------------------
00043 GrLightMgr::~GrLightMgr()
00044 {
00045         CollectGarbage();
00046 
00047         B_ASSERT( gGrLightMgr != 0 );
00048         gGrLightMgr = 0;
00049 }

00056 //----------------------------------------------------------
00057 void
00058 GrLightMgr::SetLight( const UPath& id, const SLightInfo& lightInfo )
00059 {
00060         LightMap::iterator iter = _lightMap.find( id );
00061         if ( iter != _lightMap.end() )
00062         {
00063                 iter->second->Rebuild( lightInfo );
00064                 return;
00065         }
00066         GrLight* light = new GrLight( id, lightInfo );
00067         AddLight( light );
00068 }
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 URef< GrLight >
00072 GrLightMgr::GetLight( const UPath& id, tstring& error )
00073 {
00075         LightMap::iterator iter = _lightMap.find( id );
00076         if ( iter != _lightMap.end() )
00077                 return iter->second;
00078 
00080         tstring scriptName;
00081         GetScriptName( scriptName, id.GetPathString() );
00082 
00084         if ( !gRRsrcMgr->LoadScript( scriptName, "light", error ) )
00085                 return 0;
00086 
00088         iter = _lightMap.find( id );
00089         if ( iter != _lightMap.end() )
00090                 return iter->second;
00091 
00093         error = "Light " + id.GetPathString() + " not found.";
00094         return 0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 //----------------------------------------------------------
00098 URef< GrLight >
00099 GrLightMgr::FindLight( const UPath& id )
00100 {
00102         LightMap::iterator iter = _lightMap.find( id );
00103         if ( iter != _lightMap.end() )
00104                 return iter->second;
00105 
00107         return 0;
00108 }

00111 URef< GrLight > 
00112 GrLightMgr::CreateLight( const UPath& id, const SLightInfo& lightInfo )
00113 {
00114         LightMap::iterator iter = _lightMap.find( id );
00115         if ( iter != _lightMap.end() )
00116                 return 0;
00117 
00118         GrLight* light = new GrLight( id, lightInfo );
00119         AddLight( light );
00120         return light;

00123 //----------------------------------------------------------
00124 URef< GrLight >
00125 GrLightMgr::GetOrCloneLight( const UPath& newLightId, const UPath& fromLight, tstring& error )
00126 {
00128         URef< GrLight > curLight = FindLight( newLightId );
00129         if ( curLight != 0 )
00130                 return curLight;
00131 
00133         URef< GrLight > light = GetLight( fromLight, error );
00134         if ( !light )
00135                 return 0;
00136 
00138         URef< GrLight > newLight = light->Clone( newLightId );
00139         AddLight( newLight );
00140 
00142         return newLight;
00143 }
00144 
00145 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 URef< GrLight >
00147 GrLightMgr::GetOrCloneLight( const UPath& newLightId, const GrLight* fromLight )
00148 {
00150         B_ASSERT( fromLight != 0 );
00151 
00153         URef< GrLight > light = FindLight( newLightId );
00154         if ( light != 0 )
00155                 return light;
00156 
00158         URef< GrLight > newLight = fromLight->Clone( newLightId );
00159         AddLight( newLight );
00160 
00162         return newLight;
00163 }

00182 GrLightMgr::ReloadLight( const tstring& name, tstring& error )
00183 {
00184         tstring scriptName;
00185         GetScriptName( scriptName, name );
00186         return gRRsrcMgr->LoadScript( scriptName, "light", error );

00189 //----------------------------------------------------------
00190 void
00191 GrLightMgr::ReloadAll()
00192 {
00194         tstring scriptName;
00195         std::set< tstring > scripts;
00196         LightVec::iterator iter = _lightVec.begin();
00197         const LightVec::iterator end = _lightVec.end();
00198         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00199         {
00200                 GetScriptName( scriptName, ( *iter )->GetId().GetPathString() );
00201                 scripts.insert( scriptName );
00202         }
00203 
00205         tstring errors;
00206         std::set< tstring >::iterator scriptIter = scripts.begin();
00207         const std::set< tstring >::iterator scriptEnd = scripts.end();
00208         for ( ; scriptIter != scriptEnd; ++scriptIter )
00209         {
00210                 gRRsrcMgr->LoadScript( *scriptIter, "light", errors );
00211         }
00212 }

00214 //----------------------------------------------------------
00215 void
00216 GrLightMgr::Update()
00217 {
00219         LightVec::iterator iter = _lightVec.begin();
00220         const LightVec::iterator end = _lightVec.end();
00221         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00222         {
00223                 ( *iter )->Update();
00224         }
00225 }

00227 //----------------------------------------------------------
00228 void
00229 GrLightMgr::CollectGarbage()
00230 {
00231         LightVec::iterator iter = _lightVec.begin();
00232         while ( iter != _lightVec.end() )
00233         {
00234                 if ( ( *iter )->GetRef() == 1 )
00235                 {
00237                         LightMap::iterator mapIter = _lightMap.find( ( *iter )->GetId() );
00238                         B_ASSERT( mapIter != _lightMap.end() );
00239                         _lightMap.erase( mapIter );
00240 
00242                         iter = _lightVec.erase( iter );
00243                 }
00244                 else
00245                         ++iter;
00246         }
00247 
00249         _lightVec.clear();
00250         _lightMap.clear();
00251 }
00252 
00253 //----------------------------------------------------------
00254 void
00255 GrLightMgr::GetScriptName( tstring& scriptName, const tstring& lightName )
00256 {
00258         scriptName = lightName;
00259         size_t scriptPathEnd = scriptName.find_last_of( '/' );
00260         if ( scriptPathEnd != tstring::npos )
00261         {
00262                 scriptName = scriptName.substr( 0, scriptPathEnd );
00263         }
00264 
00265         scriptName += "/"GR_LIGHTS_FILENAME;
00266 }

00273 //----------------------------------------------------------
00274 void
00275 GrLightMgr::AddLight( GrLight* light )
00276 {
00277         _lightMap[ light->GetId() ] = light;
00278         _lightVec.push_back( light );
00279 }
